alert.note: Alert for Rutherford; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Smith, northeastern Rutherford and central Wilson Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walterhill, or 8 miles north of Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Lebanon, Smyrna, La Vergne, Watertown, Walterhill, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Lascassas, Tuckers Crossroads and Gladeville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 231 and 254. Interstate 840 between mile markers 57 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
